body_html:
Still works for me with a MonitoredTrainingSession:

global_step = tf.train.get_or_create_global_step()
train_op = opt.minimize(v, global_step=global_step)
with tf.train.MonitoredTrainingSession(checkpoint_dir='/tmp/mts/') as session:
  print(session.run(v))
  session.run(train_op)

Seems to read and write checkpoints fine:

>>> reader = tf.train.NewCheckpointReader('/tmp/mts/model.ckpt-3')
>>> reader.get_variable_to_shape_map()
{'v/GradientDescent_1': [512, 256], 'v/GradientDescent': [512], 'v': [512, 256], 'global_step': []}

Without knowing more about your setup I don't see a way to figure out what the issue is.

body:
Still works for me with a `MonitoredTrainingSession`:

```
global_step = tf.train.get_or_create_global_step()
train_op = opt.minimize(v, global_step=global_step)
with tf.train.MonitoredTrainingSession(checkpoint_dir='/tmp/mts/') as session:
  print(session.run(v))
  session.run(train_op)
```

Seems to read and write checkpoints fine:

```
>>> reader = tf.train.NewCheckpointReader('/tmp/mts/model.ckpt-3')
>>> reader.get_variable_to_shape_map()
{'v/GradientDescent_1': [512, 256], 'v/GradientDescent': [512], 'v': [512, 256], 'global_step': []}
```

Without knowing more about your setup I don't see a way to figure out what the issue is.
